name: .XLF File Extension
summary: Learn about .XLF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: XML formatted file based on the XLIFF (XML Localisation Interchange File Format) specification developed by the OASIS Technical Committee; used as a standard means of exchanging localizable data and related information in a lossless format.

content: Each XLIFF document contains one or more <file> elements. These elements identify the location of data sources, such as images, databases, properties files, etc.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
